abstract: Robert "Robbie" Findley (born August 4, 1985) is an American soccer player who plays as a forward for Real Salt Lake in Major League Soccer. He has also been capped by the United States national team, making his international debut in 2007.Findley played college soccer for the Oregon State Beavers and amateur soccer for the Boulder Rapids Reserve before turning professional in 2007; he played in Major League Soccer for Los Angeles Galaxy and Real Salt Lake, before moving to English club Nottingham Forest in January 2011.
comment: Robert "Robbie" Findley (born August 4, 1985) is an American soccer player who plays as a forward for Real Salt Lake in Major League Soccer.
